title: Technological Utilization in Remote Healthcare: Factors Influencing Healthcare Professionals' Adoption and Use
summary: With the increasing importance of remote healthcare monitoring in the healthcare industry, it is essential to evaluate the usefulness and the ease of use the technology brings in remote healthcare. With this research, we want to understand the perspective of healthcare professionals, their competencies in using technology related to remote healthcare monitoring, and their trust and adoption of technology.
